recipe.ingredients: - oats: 1 cup - water: 2 cups - chopped apple: 1 medium - ground cinnamon: 1 teaspoon - vanilla extract: 1/2 teaspoon - chopped nuts (walnuts or almonds, optional): 1/4 cup - sweetener (stevia or erythritol, optional): according to taste
recipe.directions: 1. Cook Oats: In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add oats and reduce heat to low. Simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the oats are soft. 2. Add Flavors: Stir in the chopped apple, cinnamon, and vanilla extract. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. 3. Sweeten and Garnish: If desired, add a suitable amount of sweetener according to your taste preference. Garnish with chopped nuts for added texture and nutrients. 4. Serve: Serve the oatmeal warm, providing a comforting and healthy start to the day.
